item.title: Jokes about Russians and Russia
item.description: Trevor Noah: Vinyl Backwards From Some Languages Are Scary (2018). Louis C.K: A Really Crazy Place About the time Louis C.K. went to Russia in his twenties. It was 1994. â€˜Somebody told me that the Wall had just come down in the Soviet Union and that Russia was a really crazy place at the time.
